questions.quote: Oh, please. Do you know what you're talking about? Because I don't think you know what you're talking about. Take a look at that.
So you don't cry when your grandmother dies? But a hotdog makes you lose control?
Oh, yeah. I read what you said to the papers yesterday. You weren't in on the planing. What planning? YOU THINK WE PLANED THIS? Uh?
That's perfect! He's a zoo guy! He take's care of animals. C-Can I bring the squirrel by?
Fine. Fine.  Excuse me.  Think I'm gonna forget about this? I haven't forgotten about this. I don't forget that easily!
Oh, George, have you seen the American league directory? It is a big green book. Oh, thanks kiddo.
Before we get started, I am happy to tell you that Eddie Sherman is no longer writing for this catalog.
What's the deal with lampshades? I mean if it's a lamp, why do you want shade?
Okay! Well, you know, have a nice trip, and uh... alrighty!  I'll just hold down the, uh, fort!
Hu, oh. No he thought I was hiding something from him about Morgan.
